history.title: The history of this car
history.description1: We are the second owners of this amazing car...
history.description2: They were a family that took care of it from the day they got it from the dealership...

whySell.title: Why are we selling it?
whySell.description: Honestly, it’s a family matter. We had the opportunity to upgrade to a newer model...

whyBuy.title: Why buy this car?
whyBuy.description: I did the hard work for you: I reviewed over 15 cars before deciding on this one...

doubts.title: "But, there are newer and cheaper cars in its range, why choose a Japanese car?"
doubts.description: Yes, but here's the thing: the difference with other cars in its range from Mercosur is HUGE...

ideal.title: Who is this car ideal for?
ideal.city: For getting around the city: It doesn’t consume much fuel, and you can park it anywhere...
ideal.kids: For taking the kids to school: Although it doesn't seem like it, it has a lot of space inside...
ideal.firstCar: For being your first car: Just get in and drive, no complications.
ideal.travel: For traveling: It's super stable on the road, it even has a sporty touch...

carSaleInfo.contact: Write to me, and we can arrange for you to see it in person!

maintenance.description: We did everything that was recommended by those who checked it out...

feb2024.details: Cylinder head gasket replacement. New spark plugs...

aug2024.title: August 2024:

highlights.title: Why is this your next car?
highlights.point1: It uses regular gasoline, is cheap to fill up, and has very low consumption...
highlights.point2: You pay very little in taxes and insurance.
